resources.string:
Use your device to test if an electrical circuit or power outlet has power. Simply plug your charger into your device, plug the charger into the outlet, and listen for the sound! For added range, use your device with a pair of Bluetooth headphones or portable speaker!

This app can help you figure out which outlets are on which circuit breakers within your home or office or if an outlet is powered while doing minor electrical work, especially saving trips up and down the stairs after switching circuit breakers.

As always, double check before performing any work on any electrical system that power is indeed off.
Warning! When doing electrical work, always double check that there is no power to the outlet you are testing after removing your phone charger.
Would you mind giving us some feedback?
How about a rating on the Play Store, then?
Show a notification while Circuit & Outlet Tester is running.
Shows descriptive text that explains the power state of the device
If checked, the device will play a sound when the device is powered, otherwise it will play a sound when not powered
Mute sound playing from Circuit & Outlet Tester
